Package model

Class Bullet

java.lang.Object
model.Entity
model.Bullet
public class Bullet extends Entity
Bullet class is capable of representing a projectile. Bullets will travel according to their dx/dy values on every update tick. The bullet will dissapear once it goes off-screen.

  • Constructor Details

    • Bullet

      public Bullet(Game game, float x, float y, float dy, Team team)
      Create a bullet. The x and y values are absolute. dy can be used as just direction or as a speed multiplier (bullets automatically change speed depending on the team).
      Parameters:
      game - to instantiate children nodes to.
      x - absolute x position to place the bullet object.
      y - absolute y position to place the bullet object.
      dy - direction/magnitude the bullet should travel along the y-axis.
      team - team this bullet belongs to (determines speed and collision logic).

    • Bullet

      public Bullet(Game game, float dy, Team team)
      Create a bullet. dy can be used as just direction or as a speed multiplier (bullets automatically change speed depending on the team). Coordinates are set to 0,0 when created.
      Parameters:
      game - to instantiate children nodes to.
      dy - direction/magnitude the bullet should travel along the y-axis.
      team - team this bullet belongs to (determines speed and collision logic).

    • Bullet

      public Bullet(Game game, float x, float y, float width, float height, float dy, Team team)
      Create a bullet. The x and y values are absolute. dy can be used as just direction or as a speed multiplier (bullets automatically change speed depending on the team).
      Parameters:
      game - to instantiate children nodes to.
      x - absolute x position to place the bullet object (children centered).
      y - absolute y position to place the bullet object (children centered).
      width - for the bullet size.
      height - for the bullet size.
      dy - direction/magnitude the bullet should travel along the y-axis.
      team - team this bullet belongs to (determines speed and collision logic).

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      Description copied from class: Entity
      Should be overriden to add functionality for game tick updates. If instantiated, the game will be able to call this method on every game update. Will not be called as soon as it is deleted with .delete().
      Overrides:
      update in class Entity
